context.description: New JavaCompute node project Create a new Java project to contain the Java class that you want to associate with a JavaCompute node.

topic.label: JavaCompute node - Configuring the JavaCompute node

context.description: New JavaCompute node class Create a new Java class to associate with a JavaCompute node in your message flow applications. You can add any valid Java code to the class to make use of the Java plug-in API.

topic.label: JavaCompute node - Configuring the JavaCompute node
